sentences: Are you a database development enthusiast who would like to learn from a high-calibre team that are exploiting SQL Server to its fullest?
You'll be joining an online tech business who have millions of customers across the world
To say this is an exciting time to join would be an understatement!
You'll be proficient in gaining maximum performance from OLTP databases
You'll be working with vast data volumes
It's likely you'll have skills in writing lots of T-SQL, query optimisation, indexing, performance tuning and query execution plans
Having hired a manager with the client 10 years ago, we know he's still learning and that this would be a great career move for your professional development
The size and complexity of SQL Server database you'll be exposed to is unrivalled
At the same time the culture is informal
There is huge investment in tech to as this firm strive to remain No
1 in their sector
It doesn't matter if you haven't worked in a similar-sized or complex environment - what's important is you have the desire and enthusiasm to push yourself
If that sounds interesting apply to this ad, or drop me a message on LinkedIn at Ella Packham
SQL Server Database Developer - highly technical challenge
This role is fully remote; all applicants must be UK residents and hold a valid and up-to-date Right to Work documentation
Modis International Ltd acts as an employment agency for permanent recruitment and an employment business for the supply of temporary workers in the UK
Modis Europe Ltd provide a variety of international solutions that connect clients to the best talent in the world
For all positions based in Switzerland, Modis Europe Ltd works with its licensed Swiss partner Accurity GmbH to ensure that candidate applications are handled in accordance with Swiss law
Both Modis International Ltd and Modis Europe Ltd are Equal Opportunities Employers
By applying for this role your details will be submitted to Modis International Ltd and/ or Modis Europe Ltd
Our Candidate Privacy Information Statement which explains how we will use your information is available on the Modis website
